text:
equinux | Munich, Germany | Software Engineers (mobile & web-app) | Onsite

We build apps for Mac and iOS. Our two product teams building Mail Designer 365 (https://maildesigner365.com) and VPN Tracker (https://vpntracker.com) are looking for developers right now.

We have a kick-ass team, great building right on the S-Bahn and Munich is an amazing city to live & work in.

Apply via http://equinux.com/jobs
